H0.text: Colder is what the lake becomes when a growing community increases its use of fresh water for drinking and bathing.

H1.text: Deeper is what the lake will become as the growing community increases its use of fresh water for drinking and bathing.

H2.text: Larger is the lake that will become as a growing community increases its use of fresh water for drinking and bathing.

H3.text: Smaller is what the lake becomes when a growing community that relies on it for drinking and bathing increases its use of fresh water.
